plugin.name: Ok
plugin.description:
This installer will guide you through the installation of:
- Heavy Armory - a tweaked standalone version
- Animations for Heavy Armory (each animation is optional)
- Patches and tweaks

plugin.name: Heavy Armory - Lite (recommended)
plugin.description:
The lite verion of Heavy Armory with a few tweaks:
- Halebards has been renamed to Poleaxes since they are quite short and to ensure compatibility with Animated Armoury's Halebards.
- Keywords added to allow custom animations to be binded to specific weapon types and to allow SkyUI Weapons pack to show its custom icons for the added weapons.
- Changes from Unofficial Skyrim Special Edition added as well as a few other small fixes.
- Quarterstaffs and Tridents has been removed since they have no fitting animations. They are too short for the animations from Animated Armoury to work well.

plugin.name: Heavy Armory - Full
plugin.description:
The full verion of Heavy Armory with a few tweaks:
- Halebards has been renamed to Poleaxes since they are quite short and to ensure compatibility with Animated Armoury's Halebards.
- Keywords added to allow custom animations to be binded to specific weapon types and to allow SkyUI Weapons pack to show its custom icons for the added weapons.
- Changes from Unofficial Skyrim Special Edition added as well as a few other small fixes.

plugin.name: None
plugin.description: Do not install Heavy Armory.

plugin.name: Animations for Half Pikes and Tridents
WACCF
plugin.description: Choose this if you use Weapons Armor Clothing and Clutter Fixes.

plugin.name: Complete Crafting Overhaul Remastered
plugin.description: Choose this if you use Complete Crafting Overhaul Remastered (CCOR). Note that Weapons Armor Clothing and Clutter Fixes (WACCF) is a mster to CCOR. This means that selecting CCOR will overwrite your selection of WACCF above and install WACCF patches as well.

plugin.name: Install perk descriptions for Adamant
plugin.description: This will patch the perk descriptions for Adamant users. The naming of weapon types in the perk descriptions will be more generic or add in weapon types from Animated Armoury and Heavy Armory.

plugin.name: Install perk descriptions for WACCF
plugin.description: This will patch the perk descriptions for WACCF users. The naming of weapon types in the perk descriptions will be more generic or add in weapon types from Animated Armoury and Heavy Armory.

plugin.name: Install perk descriptions for vanilla
plugin.description: This will patch the perk descriptions for vanilla users. The naming of weapon types in the perk descriptions will be more generic or add in weapon types from Animated Armoury and Heavy Armory.

plugin.name: Install balance tweaks
plugin.description: This will install balancing tweaks for Heavy Armory, Skyrim Spear Mechanic and/or Animated Armoury. Note that these balancing tweaks are not compatible with Weapons Armors Clothing Clutter Fixes. Selecting this will hide WACCF options in the installer.

plugin.name: Do not install balance tweaks
plugin.description: The balancing tweaks are not compatible with Weapons Armors Clothing and Clutter Fixes.

plugin.name: Install Javelin disabler
plugin.description: The Javelin disabler will disable all crafting recipes for the javelins from Skyrim Spear Mechanic.

plugin.name: Do not install Javelin disabler
plugin.description: The Javelin disabler will disable all crafting recipes for the javelins from Skyrim Spear Mechanic.

plugin.name: Yes
plugin.description: Select yes if you use High-Level Loot Rarified (HLLR). Selecting yes will skip some patches in favor of those provided by HLLR.

plugin.name: No
plugin.description: Select yes if you use High-Level Loot Rarified (HLLR). Selecting yes will skip some patches in favor of those provided by HLLR.

plugin.name: No
plugin.description: High-Level Loot Rarified is not compatible with Weapons Armor Clothing and Clutter fixes and patches for it will not be installed.

group.name: Do you want to install level list patches?

plugin.name: Yes
plugin.description: Selecting yes will install patches that resolves conflicts in the leveled lists. Installing these patches are not nescessary if you are using a Bashed Patch.

plugin.name: No
plugin.description: Selecting yes will install patches that resolves conflicts in the leveled lists. Installing these patches are not nescessary if you are using a Bashed Patch.

plugin.name: Ok
plugin.description: Install the Ars Metallica patch from Dawnguard Arsenals nexus page to get breakdown recipes for Dawnguard Arsenal.

plugin.name: Ok
plugin.description: Install the Ars Metallica + WACCF / CCOR patch from Kryptopyr's patch hub on the nexus.

folder.source: 022 Balance tweaks for Skyrim Spear Mechanic
